content:
LSU football junior running back Tyrion DavisPrice  walks onto the field Saturday Nov PERIOD   before LSUs  win against Texas AM at Tiger Stadium in Baton Rouge La PERIOD

Former LSU running back Tyrion DavisPrice was selected ninety-third overall in the third round by the San Francisco 49ers in the  NFL Draft PERIOD DavisPrice a native of Baton Rouge as a product of Southern Laboratory High School was one of LSUs most prominent running backs over the past two seasons PERIOD

Known for being LSUs bruiser DavisPrice totaled  rushing yards over his three years at LSU and  total touchdowns PERIOD He was on the  national championship team as a freshman rushing for  yards and tallying six touchdowns on the ground including a massive 33yard rumble against Florida PERIOD

This past season DavisPrice was the clear lead back with John Emery Jr PERIOD out with academic issues PERIOD He ranked sixth in the conference in rushing yards with  on the season his career best PERIOD His best game of his career came against Florida at home where he set LSUs single game rushing record with  yards on the ground to go with three rushing touchdowns PERIOD For his efforts he was named the SEC Offensive Player of the Week and the Walter Camp National Offensive Player of the Week PERIOD
